nodes.text: The wife of troublemaker Ketticus Brayl lived together with him and their children on the planet Gorse during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In the year 11 BBY, Brayl became intoxicated and began harassing the Transcept Media Solutions employee Zaluna Myder in Gorse City, prompting Myder to tell Brayl to go to his wife and children before scaring him away with a blaster.
Ketticus Brayl's wife was first mentioned in the novel A New Dawn, which was written by John Jackson Miller and released on September 2, 2014.
